abstract: The conversion of forest land to agricultural fields must stop, a paper warns; instead, crop yields must reach their maximum potential.
snippet: The conversion of forest land to agricultural fields must stop, a paper warns; instead, crop yields must reach their maximum potential.
lead_paragraph: Trying to tap into the best thinking about the future of global agriculture, as I have tried to do in my work as a reporter, can be an exercise in frustration. Many groups and many bright people go at the problem, but not many of them go at it in a holistic way.

headline.main: Deep Thinking About the Future of Food
